Coming Soon…The Past

02 October 2008

In the last year I've taken some time to scan and catalogue hundreds of family photos. A fun, interesting, eye-opening, painful, happy, laborious exercise.

This is one such photo. Tricycle, circa 1985.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
